victoryConditions.name: Domination Victory
victoryConditions.description: Conquer all other civilizations' original capital cities.
victoryConditions.requirement: Eliminate all other civilizations' original capital cities.

victoryConditions.name: Science Victory
victoryConditions.description: Be the first civilization to launch and complete a space colonization project.

victoryConditions.name: Culture Victory
victoryConditions.description: Achieve cultural dominance by having a significant number of visiting tourists from other civilizations.
victoryConditions.requirement: Achieve a specific number of visiting tourists from other civilizations.

victoryConditions.name: Diplomatic Victory
victoryConditions.description: Win a world leader vote, achieving the support of a majority of civilizations.
victoryConditions.requirement: Win a world leader vote with a majority of support.

victoryConditions.name: Religious Victory
victoryConditions.description: Have your religion become the dominant religion in a majority of civilizations.
victoryConditions.requirement: Have your religion be the dominant religion in a majority of civilizations.

victoryConditions.name: Economic Victory
victoryConditions.description: Accumulate a specific, very high amount of gold.
victoryConditions.requirement: Accumulate a specific amount of gold.

victoryConditions.name: Score Victory
victoryConditions.description: If no other victory condition is met by a certain turn limit, the civilization with the highest score wins.
victoryConditions.requirement: Achieve the highest score by a specified turn limit.

victoryConditions.name: Bushido Victory
victoryConditions.description: Oda Nobunaga must eliminate all civilizations that have declared war on him or his allies.
victoryConditions.requirement: Eliminate all civilizations that have declared war on Oda Nobunaga or his allies.

victoryConditions.name: Shogunate Victory
victoryConditions.description: Tokugawa Ieyasu must have the highest loyalty in all cities of at least 5 civilizations.
victoryConditions.requirement: Have the highest loyalty in all cities of at least 5 civilizations.
